name: Split (itch) (NanOxidium, GaroshurlaTAMER, Hikari_Art)
description:
Our submission for the Global Game Jam 2022, where the theme was "Duality"

Everyone sees the world differently...

But what happens when you wake up, locked with weird headaches near your own reflection ? what is with the constant feeling of not being completly alone?

How do you plan to escape ?

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to interact with the world

Right click to remove the item in your hand

CREDITS

Main menu music

Main Theme music

Other Sounds from https://freesound.org/

Programmer : Nano

Artist : Hikari

Level Designer : Garosh
